H0.text: In which North Yorkshire town is the Green Howards Museum. Scarborough

H1.text: In which North Yorkshire town is the Green Howards Museum. Harrogate

H2.text: In which North Yorkshire town is the Green Howards Museum. Skipton

H3.text: In which North Yorkshire town is the Green Howards Museum. RICHMOND

A4.text: The Gallowgate Memorial stands overlooking Frenchgate, taking the form of a Celtic cross and is dedicated to the losses suffered by the Green Howards regiment during both the First and Second World Wars.

A5.text: During the First World War, Richmond's own Green Howards Regiment raised 24 battalions for the war effort, the castle assumed a role as a barracks and training camp for new recruits
